56e55ce0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.name: Homena
personalityTraits: I am always calm, no matter what the situation. I never raise my voice or let my emotions control me.
I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy.
56e55ce0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.ideal: Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy.
56e55ce0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.bond: My ill-gotten gains go to support my family.
56e55ce0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.flaw: When faced with a choice between money and my friends, I usually choose the money.
56e55ce0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.talent: I'm a natural with problem solving.
56e55ce0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.description: Elf with short build. They have a chiseled face with large silver eyes and  plucked eyebrows with a long nose and a straight teeth mouth. Their hair is shoulder-length and silver in color.

56e5ab00-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.name: Ruangt
personalityTraits: I am horribly, horribly awkward in social situations.
I face problems head-on. A simple, direct solution is the best path to success.
56e5ab00-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.ideal: Logic. Emotions must not cloud our logical thinking.
56e5ab00-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.bond: My life's work is a series of tomes related to a specific field of lore.
56e5ab00-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.flaw: I overlook obvious solutions in favor of complicated ones.
56e5ab00-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.description: Elf with short build. They have a chiseled face with fringed long lash emerald eyes and  trim eyebrows with a straight nose and a gleaming white teeth mouth. Their hair is bouncy and brown in color.

56e62030-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.name: Atsuka
personalityTraits: My eloquent flattery makes everyone I talk to feel like the most wonderful and important person in the world.
The best way to get me to do something is to tell me I can't do it.
56e62030-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.ideal: Respect. Respect is due to me because of my position, but all people regardless of station deserve to be treated with dignity.
56e62030-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.bond: I am in love with the heir of a family that my family despises.
56e62030-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.flaw: By my words and actions, I often bring shame to my family.
56e62030-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.talent: I have a high pain tolerance.
56e62030-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.description: Elf with skinny build. They have a chiseled face with bedroom glacial blue eyes and  arched eyebrows with a straight nose and a straight teeth mouth. Their hair is bouncy and silver in color.

56e64740-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.name: Atsum
personalityTraits: I'm convinced that people are always trying to steal my secrets.
I don't like to get my hands dirty, and I won't be caught dead in unsuitable accommodations.
56e64740-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.ideal: Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge.
56e64740-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.bond: I work to preserve a library, university, scriptorium, or monastery.
56e64740-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.flaw: Unlocking an ancient mystery is worth the price of a civilization.
56e64740-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.talent: I have a high pain tolerance.
56e64740-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.description: Elf with short build. They have a chiseled face with sparkling emerald eyes and  straight eyebrows with a straight nose and a straight teeth mouth. Their hair is bouncy and silver in color.

56e66e50-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.name: Fuaka
personalityTraits: I'm used to helping out those who aren't as smart as I am, and I patiently explain anything and everything to others.
I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong.
56e66e50-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.ideal: Self-Improvement. The goal of a life of study is the betterment of oneself.
56e66e50-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.bond: My life's work is a series of tomes related to a specific field of lore.
56e66e50-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.flaw: Most people scream and run when they see a demon. I stop and take notes on its anatomy.
56e66e50-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.description: Elf with average height build. They have a chiseled face with bedroom blue eyes and  straight eyebrows with a straight nose and a Cupid's bow mouth. Their hair is straight and blonde in color.

56e69560-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.name: Atsum
personalityTraits: I'm convinced that people are always trying to steal my secrets.
I use polysyllabic words that convey the impression of great erudition.
56e69560-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.ideal: Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge.
56e69560-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.bond: It is my duty to protect my students.
56e69560-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.flaw: I am easily distracted by the promise of information.
56e69560-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.description: Elf with skinny build. They have a chiseled face with bedroom silver eyes and  plucked eyebrows with a strong nose and a straight teeth mouth. Their hair is straight and silver in color.

56e6bc70-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.name: Yumino
personalityTraits: I face problems head-on. A simple, direct solution is the best path to success.
I've enjoyed fine food, drink, and high society among my temple's elite. Rough living grates on me.
56e6bc70-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.ideal: Independence. When people follow orders blindly, they embrace a kind of tyranny.
56e6bc70-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.bond: Someone saved my life on the battlefield. To this day, I will never leave a friend behind.
56e6bc70-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.flaw: My hatred of my enemies is blind and unreasoning.
56e6bc70-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.description: Elf with broad-shouldered build. They have a sharp cheekbones face with bright silver eyes and  straight eyebrows with a long nose and a Cupid's bow mouth. Their hair is shoulder-length and blonde in color.

56e6e380-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.name: Re
personalityTraits: I use polysyllabic words that convey the impression of great erudition.
I've enjoyed fine food, drink, and high society among my temple's elite. Rough living grates on me.
56e6e380-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.ideal: No Limits. Nothing should fetter the infinite possibility inherent in all existence.
56e6e380-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.bond: I sold my soul for knowledge. I hope to do great deeds and win it back.
56e6e380-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.flaw: Most people scream and run when they see a demon. I stop and take notes on its anatomy.
56e6e380-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.description: Elf with short build. They have a chiseled face with bedroom silver eyes and  plucked eyebrows with a long nose and a rosebud mouth. Their hair is straight and silver in color.

56e70a90-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.name: Yuw
56e70a90-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.specialty: A celestial, fey, or similar creature gave me a blessing or revealed my secret origin.
personalityTraits: Thinking is for other people. I prefer action.
I'm used to helping out those who aren't as smart as I am, and I patiently explain anything and everything to others.
56e70a90-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.ideal: Fairness. No one should get preferential treatment before the law, and no one is above the law.
56e70a90-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.bond: I wish my childhood sweetheart had come with me to pursue my destiny.
56e70a90-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.flaw: The tyrant who rules my land will stop at nothing to see me killed.
56e70a90-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.talent: I have a knack for languages.
56e70a90-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.description: Elf with lean build. They have a chiseled face with sweeping eyelash silver eyes and  straight eyebrows with a strong nose and a straight teeth mouth. Their hair is straight and silver in color.

56e731a0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.name: Zhai
personalityTraits: I am tolerant (or intolerant) of other faiths and respect (or condemn) the worship of other gods.
My eloquent flattery makes everyone I talk to feel like the most wonderful and important person in the world.
56e731a0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.ideal: Faith. I trust that my deity will guide my actions. I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well.
56e731a0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.bond: I seek to preserve a sacred text that my enemies consider heretical and seek to destroy.
56e731a0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.flaw: Once I pick a goal, I become obsessed with it to the detriment of everything else in my life.
56e731a0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.talent: I'm great at getting my point across.
56e731a0-24eb-11ed-80f1-d5095e102791.description: Elf with short build. They have a chiseled face with bright silver eyes and  plucked eyebrows with a strong nose and a glossy mouth. Their hair is straight and silver in color.
